strand::operator==

Compare two strands for equality. 

friend bool operator==(
    const strand & a,
    const strand & b);

Two strands are equal if they refer to the same ordered, non-concurrent state.

Requirements

Header: asio/strand.hpp

Convenience header: asio.hpp
